content.text:
# List of MPs elected in the 1830 United Kingdom general election

| term_start = 26 October 1830
| term_end = 23 April 1831
| chamber1 = House of Commons
| membership1 = 658
| chamber1_leader1_type = Speaker
| chamber1_leader1 = Charles Manners-Sutton
| chamber1_leader2_type = Leader
| chamber1_leader2 = John Spencer
| chamber1_leader3_type = Leader of the Opposition
| chamber1_leader3 = Sir Robert Peel
}}
This is a list of MPs elected to the House of Commons at the 1830 United Kingdom general election, arranged by constituency. The Parliament was summoned 24 July 1830, assembled 14 September 1830 (but prorogued to 26 October) and dissolved 23 April 1831. The Prime Minister was the leader of the Whig Party, Charles Grey, 2nd Earl Grey.
{| border="0" id="toc" style="margin: 0 auto;" align=center
